2014-08-30.abstract: Rovio says chief executive Mikael Hed will step down by end of 2014 as company struggles financially.

2014-08-30.snippet: Even the government aid and the elimination of 6,000 jobs will not guarantee a successful restructuring, the majority owner said....
2014-08-30.lead_paragraph: Even the government aid and the elimination of 6,000 jobs will not guarantee a successful restructuring, the majority owner said.
2014-08-30.abstract: Malaysia Airlines announces restructuring plan that will cut 6,000 jobs, about 30 percent of its workforce; airline will receive bailout from Malaysian government amounting to nearly $2 billion.

headline.main: Malaysia Airlines to Cut Work Force and Get Almost $2 Billion Bailout
headline.print_headline: Malaysia Airlines Will Get a Big Bailout and Cut Jobs

2014-08-30.snippet: Hermès, famed for its Birkin and Kelly handbags, recorded a net profit of 413 million euros, or $544 million, for the first six months of the year....
2014-08-30.lead_paragraph: Hermès, famed for its Birkin and Kelly handbags, recorded a net profit of 413 million euros, or $544 million, for the first six months of the year.
2014-08-30.abstract: Hermes International says its profit rose 8 percent for first six months of 2014; company records net profit of 413 million euros, or about $545 million, for six months of the year, up from 382 million euros in period year earlier.

headline.main: Hermès Posts Rise in Profit, Despite Slowing Sales in China
headline.print_headline: Hermès Profits Rise, Despite Slowing Sales in China

2014-08-31.snippet: A growing number of credit unions and nonprofit groups are using lotteries to encourage low-income families to save....
2014-08-31.lead_paragraph: A growing number of credit unions and nonprofit groups are using lotteries to encourage low-income families to save.
2014-08-31.abstract: Growing number of credit unions and nonprofit groups, seeking to encourage savings among low-income families, are establishing prize-linked savings accounts that emulate the appeal of lotteries; accounts essentially treat every deposit as a ticket in a prizewinning raffle, offering thrill of gambling without the risk.

headline.main: Using Gambling to Entice Low-Income Families to Save
headline.print_headline: Gambling Is the Bait. Savings Are the Jackpot.

2014-08-31.snippet: Professional video gaming is becoming a worldwide spectator sport offering big prizes to competitors and helping the game industry gain even greater cultural and economic clout....
2014-08-31.lead_paragraph: Professional video gaming is becoming a worldwide spectator sport offering big prizes to competitors and helping the game industry gain even greater cultural and economic clout.
2014-08-31.abstract: Professional video gaming is becoming a global spectator sport, with team competitions that are helping the industry forge an even stronger cultural and economic foothold; experts estimate that some 70 million people watch so-called e-sports over the Internet or on TV, and tournaments are drawing crowds in the thousands, and offering prize money in the millions (Series: Power Up).

headline.main: In E-Sports, Video Gamers Draw Real Crowds and Big Money
headline.print_headline: Virtual Games Draw Real Crowds and Big Money

2014-08-31.snippet: The experimental drug developed by the Swiss company Novartis reduced the risk of dying from cardiovascular causes and could replace what has been the bedrock treatment for more than 20 years, researchers said....
2014-08-31.lead_paragraph: The experimental drug developed by the Swiss company Novartis reduced the risk of dying from cardiovascular causes and could replace what has been the bedrock treatment for more than 20 years, researchers said.
2014-08-31.abstract: Research published in The New England Journal of Medicine finds that new experimental drug has shown striking efficacy in prolonging lives of people with heart failure; developed by Novartis and known by code name LCZ696, drug could replace longstanding treatment for a condition that is the leading cause of hospitalization in United States and Europe.

headline.main: New Novartis Drug Effective in Treating Heart Failure
headline.print_headline: New Novartis Drug Effective in Treating Heart Failure
